评论概述: "Aqua floral" color option is not aqua; it's Mint.
评论详情: Ordered the "aqua floral" as a gift for step mom - she has light blue eyes so I wanted the dress in aqua. She showed it to me today -- she absolutely loves it and it is gorgeous and has nice details but it's NOT AQUA!  BACKGROUND COLOR IS  definitely MINT.  Fortunately she doesn't know it was supposed to be aqua. >:-(

评论概述: Ordered Brown but dress was Rust/Burnt Orange
评论详情: I really liked the style especially the detail on the sleeves, but this was not brown. The picture is this dress on another dress by same brand that is brown. Didn’t even try it on due to mislabeled color.

评论概述: Beautiful dress I purchased for a wedding
评论详情: I have been looking at this dress since last year and waffling about whether or not to buy it since everyone said that it is quite wrinkled and you have to steam iron it. I purchased it in a size medium and it fits perfectly and is true to size. It is really beautiful and I think I'm going to get a lot of use out of it. This is a perfect dress for beach restaurants, weddings and church. The people who said it was a wrinkled mess were not lying! I was getting ready to purchase a steam iron when I had an idea to just spritz the dress down with cold distilled water from a sprayer I use to mist my plants. It worked like a charm! Even the ruffles towards the bottom which were all pointing up are now laying flat as you can see. I just kept running my hand over the dress for about five minutes front and back after I spritzed it and it took all of the wrinkles out.I'm going to try that little trick on some other items when traveling now instead of taking a steam iron along. I would recommend this dress or any of the other dresses in this line.
I have a smaller bust, so it fits well, but if you are bigger busted, size up. It’s a beautiful dress though

评论概述: Great dress, but "Brown" is NOT brown
评论详情: I love this dress, and have it in several colors and patterns. However, be advised the "brown" is not remotely brown and is more of a rust or brick color. Still cute though, I kept it.
I loved the dress.  It did not fit.  The waistband was way to tight.  No other size to chose from.  So I will continue to look for another dress.

Bought this dress for Thanksgiving and absolutely loved it! I live in Miami, it is always warm, so I wanted something that would breathe. This is one of the few cotton dresses that still looks appropriate for a casual- dressy occasion.  My only call out would be is I am short so anyone that is tall should expect this dress to hit higher than just above the ankle.  This is a size small, for reference I am 5'3, 145lbs, 34d, size u.s. 6 in women's jeans.

I bought this for my trip to Egypt and it was a hit for photos and the warm weather. It fit me true to size, I'm 5'8" and 125lbs and I got a small. It does wrinkle but irons and steams fast. I got the color "ginger" and want it in other colors now. The other girls on the trip really liked it as well and it's the dress that got me the most compliments.

评论概述: Material is way too cheap for the price
评论详情: The dress is cute and fits well, but the material is so thin and cheaply made. I like the dress but it shouldn’t cost more than $20

I was looking for a nursing friendly dress that wasn’t boring. This dress has lots of detail and is comfortable. Flattering for a postpartum figure. It’s a little thin but has held up well being washed.
I bought this for my hawaii trip and I loved it. It's light and fits nicely. I love the colors and design.
Excellent product very very pretty and soft
much darker than amazon depicts so returning. sleeves are much shorter too..
I enjoyed wearing this dress over the summer. It was comfortable and flattering.
Did not fit well, returned

I’m so very happy with this dress!  I ordered it in large and it fit like a dream!  I’m 5”9, 38B, and somewhere in the 160s with an athletic build.  I kept the top button unbuttoned and still had plenty of coverage.  Fabric is nice and it washed up nicely.  I put it in a garment bag and hung it up to dry and literally no wrinkles!  I’m ordering two more!!!!  I did have to cut a few loose strings, but other than that, it’s the perfect dress!!!  🙌🏻🙌🏻
I love how the dress feels and looks! I don’t care for the long ties that tangled in the wash. My strings broke the first time I washed it. It would be good to wash this in a giant lingerie bag.
Runs small if you are busty. Had to return.
I like the clors and designs, but the waist is unforgiving and not for an XL.
Beautiful colors and material
The dress exceeded my expectations. Lovely fabric and cut. It fits me perfectly.
I love the fabric.  I’m a large chested woman and it falls perfectly just under the girls to give a little sexy vibe to a country side dress.  I love it!
I sent it back! Need I say more? 😡
Love the dress and the color. But it is so wrinkled, I don't know if I will be able to wear it.
Delivered to me with a rip in the hem. Good thing i needed to have it hemmed!
The colors are much brighter than the picture, so if you’re looking for pastel colors, this is not your dress.
I wore this dress to my baby shower and got so many compliments! Very cute and good quality for the money! True to size.

i got this dress for a wedding. my sons wore blue, aqua green, and my husband wore pink so we all coordinated and looked beautiful.  i am 5’6”, usually a size 8, but also 22 weeks pregnant at time of purchase. I still got a medium and it fit wonderful!  it’s soft, flowy, fun, and modest.  there are some stringy threads that i snipped off.
The dress was too small through the bust.

评论概述: The material  very great quality. Amazing!!
评论详情: Everything I liked!! True to size and doesn't wrinkle and wash and dry via washer and the material feels very good quality!
Unfortunately the dress is a little snug in the bust and rib area, it will be hard to iron with the ruffle/layers.  I am not ordering a large as it will be too long and to big in other areas.

I love this dress. It fits well, Is very flattering, looks better than the picture, even though the picture is great. Every time i wear it, women stop me and say they love it! The colors are beautiful and vivid. I NEVER dry it in the dryer, because I'm pretty sure it would shrink.

So comfortable, but I will say I removed the elastic from the back. Easy to do. It made the dress more flowy and so much more comfortable. That is a preference thing, I don’t like tight around my waist. I ordered another in this style and did the same thing. I always get compliments when I wear either one. Perfect summer dress but I foresee leggings and sweaters for the winter too.
Lovely dress. Comfortable and lightweight. True to size medium for 5”6 weight 135. Great for hot temperatures and breathable cotton. 5 stars
Cute dress. I like my dresses long but be aware if you like them short! But overall, nice dress.

I wasn’t too sure about the dress. I ordered it and it took forever to arrive and what a thrill when it came. I love long maxi dresses and I have too many but this one was a great addition and I ended up ordering the white with blue flowers also
Ordered a large. Normally I wear a size 8. This was way too small. More like a size 4. Also extremely wrinkled
Love the dress, great fit. The color  green isn't the color that was shown but still love it
The material is nice, not polyester. It does run small. It fit but wasn't like the photo.

评论概述: I like that it's rayon, but...
评论详情: the dress did me no favors in the style department. On account of having a large bust (36H), I sized up, which I'm okay with because rayon shrinks and the clothing tends to fit me more appropriately, however, the sleeves on my bigger arms and my large bust just wasn't working for me and I didn't want to wash it and take the chance I would still dislike it on myself, so I sent it back. I do like the print, and the color is darker, as others have reported, then the creamy beige, peach and teal as advertised, and I much prefer rayon to polyester. I would have worn a slip with it because it is see thru with light behind you.

评论概述: Beautiful dress.  So comfortable.  Love the color too

评论详情: I really like this dress, however, the top botton broke very easily and it wrinkles VERY easily! I would probably consider it worth ironing... but just know that after sitting in a chair for 2 minutes it will be wrinkly again. :)
Beautiful, able to wear to work as well as to more casual events.
The colors are bright and vibrant. The material is cool and flows. The fabric and fit are comfortable. Fabric is lightweight.

It's a very cute boho looking lightweight dress. Sizing was correct. I love the sleeves.  My only negative is I wish it was about 2 inches longer to cover my ankles. But I knew it prob would not be floor length when I ordered it.  Color was exactly as pictured.

评论概述: Wife loved it and fit well
评论详情: Wife loved it and fit well she's got the curves and I worked well with that. She said it ran true to size
I used this dress for a family photo shoot. The fit was true to size and very comfortable!
Fit perfectly on my pear shape body! Very flattering. Flowy, beautiful blue and white floral looked really cute with my fancy blue/white flip flops. Perfect for a brunch party!
I ordered this dress because of style, color and light weight fabric. I wore it to a bridal shower and got many compliments. Well made and good quality for the price.
This dress was very disappointing. Color was darker than pictured. And did not look the same on as pictured. Looked frumpy!  That’s why I returned this dress.
Cómodo y muy fresca buena calidad vestido🥰👍
Wedding
Size was as described

I loved the style of this dress. It’s a little extra fitting in the chest but I am a bit bigger in that area. After the first wash with other brand new clothes, no zippers or anything to snag onto, the dress ended up with a hole in the fabric. Luckily it’s at the bottom so it’s not super noticeable.

I love this dress! super comfortable and cute, perfect for the outdoor wedding I'm going to! light and flowy! I would say it runs a tiny bit small but not too bad. unfortunately when I was steaming it I noticed it had a bunch of stains/spots on it. I didn't notice them right away when I first got it so now it's too late to send it back and get a new one for the wedding. It also smells like strong detergent, I've never had a new dress smell before. I'm going to try and wash it and see if I can get the spots out. also not the purple I thought it would be.
Fabric, pattern and style not even vaguely similar to what was described and shown. Disappointed as it was for a special family occasion...initiated return immediately.

I first ordered an extra large, because everything that I have order online has been too small across my shoulders and short waisted.  This dress was true to size.  I got my regular size, a large, and it fits perfectly.  It is a lovely dress and, the material is wonderful.

I don’t typically write reviews but making time to comment on this dress. I am 5’11 and 146lbs. This dress was perfect length and fit beautifully. I had so many compliments and requests of where I purchased it. Very comfortable, stylish and well made. Buying another in different color. Don’t pass on this dress ladies!!
Dress fit well although 4 inches too long.

评论概述: Definitely order up a few sizes
评论详情: I read the reviews and most stated that the sizing is way off. It is true. I’m normally a small but ordered a large, and it fits perfectly. I’m 5’3,  120lbs, bust 34. I ordered the sage green and the color is beautiful as depicted. I also don’t have to shorten the dress, the length is perfect. Since, I just received the dress, I’m not sure if it will shrink. Also, it arrived wrinkled, but cotton tends to wrinkle, so no surprise here.
I like the dress but not the extra ruffle.  I have to iron it to lay down.

This dress was surprisingly flattering! I wore it as a bridesmaid dress, and I wasn’t thrilled about the orange color (she had a unique set of wedding colors). However, when this dress came it was the cutest orange I’d ever seen! The bright, yet dusty hue along with the flowy design was incredibly stylish and comfortable at the same time :). The dress does wrinkle if packed in a suitcase, but I just hung it up while running a shower so it would steam out the wrinkles. Cute dress! Very breathable and durable.
I ended up returning it. It was cute, but it looked  big on me despite getting a size small.

评论概述: Cute dress, but very country looking
评论详情: I debated on keeping the dress for a long time and ultimately returned it because of how country it looked. It’s not a timeless or classy print, and give it a few years will probably be out of fashion, which is why I didn’t keep it. But for the quality of the dress, it was great. It was lightweight and thin fabric. The top felt flattering without being very revealing our gappy and I liked the detail. I could see this material shrinking quite a bit in the wash, but never got around to that. The overall cut and style of the dress was great. I just wish it had better print options that weren’t so flamboyant .
Liked the dress very much perfect fit
Such a beautiful dress. Got so many compliments

评论概述: Kept Me Cute and Comfortable at 115 Degrees
评论详情: Living through another heatwave in the American Southwest, but still have to function.  I wore the dress to run errands and then go to dinner and a movie yesterday.  Lots of walking in hot parking lots.  Some standing around waiting to get in.  The loose, lightweight fabric kept me feeling cooler and looking good.
My wife loves this dress. She said it fits her well, the material is nice and she received several compliments on it when she wore it to church this past Sunday.
Light weight fabric just perfect for this summer. Exactly as pictured.

After looking at the reviews I ordered a size up and I’m glad I did. The fabric is cool and flowy and I’ve had a lot of compliments. I ordered a second dress in a more “casual” pattern for everyday wear. I have not washed it yet so I don’t know how it’ll shrink but I plan on hand washing and line drying it to be on the safe side.

评论概述: So incredibly beautiful I wish it fit me
评论详情: So incredibly beautiful I wish it fit me I can sometimes wear an 18 depending upon the company. That's as large as this one went so I gave it a try. It was too small for me I needed more like a 20 or 22. This is the perfect style of dress for someone like me but they just didn't make it large enough. The fabric is beautiful the pattern is beautiful everything about this dress is beautiful. So sad that I have to return it.
Loved the style & colors in the dress. Seems to run a size or two too small.
The sizing is weird (small is tiny, medium is tiny, large is tiny, X large is HUGE!) (I usually wear a medium) Nice feeling fabric Tassel got ripped off by toddler already

Seams and little details just somehow off… contributing to an overall perception of cheapness Main gripe is that they don’t accommodate chest. Waistband is lifted high in front like Empire waist and correct height and back at actual waist and looks bad. This is because the chest pouches are too small to accommodate a chest, so the bodice fabric doesn’t have the length to reach the waist

评论概述: Soft, gorgeous cut, perfect for summer
评论详情: I ordered the large and it fit my 36G breasts well. The sleeves have very pretty detailing and it was a great length for my height (5'7). I wore this to a reunion at a winery and got many compliments on it. It also kept me covered while chasing a toddler around.

I am a size 14 ordered the XL which said size 16-18 - I wanted dress to be big on me but fits tight under bust - definitely not correct sizing !! BEWARE ! Fabric is soft but dress is very wrinkly - not a wash and go dress

评论概述: Love the colors and fit of this dress
评论详情: This dress is beautiful and very flattering. It is a great length and a good weight for spring/summer. Very comfortable and fits true to size.
I bought it in 2 colors ! I get some many compliments! Dress is super comfy
Soft and lightweight. Too short for tall people. Returned it
I love this pattern and the fit is nice and comfy but doesn’t make me look like I’m wearing a tent.  The material is nice and light and cool but not so thin it clings.  Great dress!

This dress is pretty and flattering, seems to fit as expected. The fabric is ok, not the nicest but not the worst. My biggest issue is that the dress is much darker than the advertised color in the photos, like somebody desaturated the photos. Given that I’m building a capsule wardrobe that was not ideal. I was looking forward to the sea-glass green as a main color rather than the teal. I’m going to keep it as I need it for an upcoming event but I am annoyed. So please be aware that the advertising photos are not accurate.
Nice dress, however very wrinkly and impossible to iron out.  So I'll be returning it.
The dress was comfortable and fit well. The only feature I did not like was the low cut V in front. It would have changed the shape of the dress to stitch it up, so back it went.

评论概述: Closet staple for almost 5 years now!
评论详情: This dress is so flattering and I believe it would be on all body types (I have an hour-glass shape). I bought this dress back in 2019 in medium and my body has definitely grown and changed over the years. Right now I am 8 months pregnant and this dress is so cute with my growing belly. I don’t know if I’ll be able to wear it full term but in the meantime, I will wear it until I can’t. I currently have two other colors in my shopping cart in a size large so I have one to wear the remaining of my pregnancy. The buttons on the dress also make it is nursing friendly.  The colors are beautiful, there are little bits of pinks and purples mixed in with the bright blue. Such a beautiful pattern. Lights and flowy, perfect for spring & summer. I throw in the wash but always let it hang-dry.

Loved this dress. It was just what I was hoping for. I ordered a medium after reading some reviews. I am 5’6 and it fits to my ankles. I weigh 125, bust 34c, thought the fit was perfect. I would definitely get another❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ Hope this helps.

I have this dress in two colors now and I DO like it. But this second one showed up and is very much a brick red color, not brown as advertised. Fabric is light and a bit thin but it'll make for a nice light summer dress.

The neckline on this dress is very strange. It fits, but is so high at the back that it cuts into the back of my neck and sort of feels like I'm wearing an uncomfortable halter top.  Its pretty though.
Disappointed in dress. Not flattering at all. Looks like a dress from Little House on the prairie.

The dress fits as I expected. It is very light weight so it flows well. You do need a slip or liner of some kind because you can see through the material.  It doesn't look that great on the hanger, but I received several compliments when I wore it.
Beautiful dress, great fit. Material is not stretchy, and color is a little lighter then pictured. Felt "handmaids' tail" while wearing, just not for me. Returned item.

评论概述: Badly misproportioned - the "waist" is much too high
评论详情: This would be a lovely dress if the waist wasn't half a foot too high. When will manufacturers figure out that the "waist" of the dress is supposed to be at the woman's actual waistline, not wedged up high under her boobs?  The proportions might be OK if you're somewhat short, and wear size Small, and have a small chest (although in that case, the dress overall may be too long). If you're larger and 'better endowed', the waist will be 5" or 6" too high up. Their idea of adjusting for larger sizes was probably to only make it wider (i.e. one direction only, although women are three-dimensional).  If they had only scaled up their sizes rationally, rather than cutting corners and being lazy about it, I'd buy at least two or three more of these. What a waste!
Love this dress it is flattering and the beautiful pattern is a well made dress. Can be dressed up or worn casually.
Great fit! This is a light weight summer dress!
Cute, has that wrinkle look. Wouldn't recommend drying it. Good quality fabric. Comfortable.

Wore it for the first time and I got so many compliments! It's light and very breathable. I'm 5'7", 138 and I got a small. Fits great, except if you're small chested like me then the chest area is a little baggy. I haven't washed it yet, but I'll try to remember to air dry it to avoid shrinking.
Comfortable and perfect summer dress
I think this dress is gorgeous and so flattering! … the first time you wear it. I washed this once and followed directions by washing in cold water. It shrunk up so much :( I am so sad

评论概述: Pretty fabric ... but dress is not flattering
评论详情: I bought this dress after reading many of the reviews and looking at several of the photos posted.  I was disappointed by the fit of the waistline.  It wasn't an empire fit, nor a waistline, but somewhere in between.  The dress is beautiful on the model, but it did not fit me in the same way.  I am 5'5" and wear size 14. I ordered an XL just to be sure it wasn't tight -- it wasn't.  However, the waistline was way off and the dress was not complimentary - there's a lot of fabric in this dress.
The color was nice, but the cheap rough feeling fabric wasn’t great. It has no stretch or give at all. The fit was ok but I needed a bigger size to be able to move in it.
Loved this dress when I got it and wore for the first time. Washed in cold and air dried. No longer fit. Completely shrunk.
